title: Why do we procrastinate?
description: Do you leave your work until the last minute?

vocabItems.definition: delaying doing things that must be done until later, often because they are boring, difficult or unpleasant

vocabItems.word: without a shadow of a doubt
vocabItems.definition: used to emphasise that you are completely certain of something
feeling stressed or anxious because of having too much to do
acting suddenly and instinctively, without thinking about the consequences of your actions
a very large amount of something pleasant
